segments.text: What do you usually have for breakfast ? Pancakes or waffles ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I usually have cereal for breakfast .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But isn't it served with cold milk ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah . Cold milk wakes me up .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Chinese people don't like to eat cold food .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But I'm open to new things . I'll have a bowl of cereal , too .
segments.speaker: S1
